content: 127 double_crochet 17 59 double_crochet 24 83 double_crochet 31 107 double_crochet 38 131 double_crochet ____________________________________________________________________________ this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way you may sell any items produced please credit the designer 4 posh f iber designs ____________________________________________________________________________ border 1 slip_stitch to next chain-2 space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 dcbp around each st to chain-2 corner * 2dc chain-2 2dc in chain 2 space dcbp around each stitch to chain-2 corner** repeat from * to ** 2 more times join with slip_stitch 131 dcbp & 4dc sts between chain-2 sps 2 slip_stitch to next chain-2 space chain 3 1 double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 skip next stitch double_crochet chain-2 double_crochet in next st skip next 2 sts repeat to next to last stitch on the row skip last st in row * 2dc chain-2 2dc in chain 2 space skip next stitch double_crochet chain-2 double_crochet in next st skip next 2 sts repeat to next to last stitch on the row skip last st in row ** repeat from * to ** 2 more times join with slip_stitch 45 v_stitch & 4dc sts between chain-2 sps 3 slip_stitch to next chain-2 space chain 3 2 double_crochet chain-1 3 double_crochet in chain-2 skip next stitch 8 double_crochet in next chain-2 space single_crochet in next chain-2 space 8 double_crochet in next chain-2 space repeat to chain-2 corner * 3dc chain-1 3dc in chain 2 space 8 double_crochet in next chain-2 space single_crochet in next chain-2 space 8 double_crochet in next chain-2 space repeat to chain-2 corner ** repeat from * to ** 2 more times join with slip_stitch 187 double_crochet 22 single_crochet sts between chain-2 sps 4 top stitch with a slip_stitch around the edge of the entire blanket
